arguments.name: Range
arguments.description: One or more cells to average, including numbers or names, arrays, or references that contain numbers.

arguments.name: Criteria
arguments.description: The criteria in the form of a number, expression, cell reference, or text that defines which cells are averaged. For example, criteria can be expressed as 32, "32", ">32", "apples", or B4.

arguments.name: Average_range
arguments.description: The actual set of cells to average. If omitted, range is used.
